data.name: txtLoginFoodNetwork
data.value: Our infinite food network starts with you !!

data.name: txtLoginUnleash
data.value: Unleash your creativity and passion through Presto.

data.name: txtLoginDesc
data.value: Just tap the button below to register/login through Facebook. Eh.. we love to keep it simple.

data.name: txtUserSignUpPageTopMsg
data.value: Great!! You are just few steps away from starting a restaurant on Presto

data.name: txtUserSignUpPageBtmMsg
data.value: Tap continue button below to continue.

data.name: txtProfileStepOneKitchenDesc
data.value: In a few words, please describe about you, what you are good at and what your kitchen can offer to your customers. You can change this any time. We highly recommend you do best sales pitch here.
